name: 5 Eyes: A Boss Battle
description:
Originally intended for TriJam 125 (3 Hour/Teammate Game Jam), but a storm came through my neighborhood and knocked out the power. I was far enough along that I decided to finish it and upload it here after taking some time to add some polish.

-- Controls --
Move Left: A or Left Arrow,
Move Right: D or Right Arrow,
Jump: W, Up Arrow, or Space Bar,
Aim and Shoot: Mouse/Left Click (You can hold left mouse button down too).

Enjoy.

-- Time --
Code: 5 hours.
Art: 2 hours.
Stealing Sounds From NES Super C: 30 minutes.

Music: TechoAxe - Nebula Boss Fight
